code: import{Coffee,LogIn,LogOut,PlayCircle}from'lucide-react-native';export const PUNCH_TYPE_META={in:{id:'in',label:'出勤',color:'#007AFF',icon:LogIn},break_start:{id:'break_start',label:'休憩',color:'#FF9500',icon:Coffee},break_end:{id:'break_end',label:'再開',color:'#007AFF',icon:PlayCircle},out:{id:'out',label:'退勤',color:'#34C759',icon:LogOut}};export const PUNCH_TYPE_ORDER=['in','break_start','break_end','out'];export const PUNCH_STATUS_TRANSITIONS={in:'working',break_start:'break',break_end:'working',out:'finished'};export const DEFAULT_SELECTION_BY_STATUS={none:'in',working:'out',break:'break_end',finished:'in'};export const PUNCH_PROCESSING_DELAY_MS=800;export const NOW_TICK_INTERVAL_MS=1000;export const getPunchColor=type=>type?PUNCH_TYPE_META[type]?.color??'#ddd':'#ddd';export const getPunchLabel=type=>type?PUNCH_TYPE_META[type]?.label??'選択':'選択';
